transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello ji?
Executive: IndiaMART se call kiya tha aapne?
Customer: Aap kaun bol rahe hain?
Executive: Neha baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Oh accha Neha ji, haan haan haan. Actually maine isliye call kiya tha, mujhe ye jaanna tha ki wo jo agar IndiaMART ka kisi seller ko maine payment kiya hai.
Customer: For a product.
Executive: Aapne 96 wale number pe call kiya tha kya?
Customer: Ji 96 wale number pe call kiya tha.
Executive: Haan, kya issue aa raha hai?
Customer: Accha puch raha hu ki agar suppose main kisi seller ko payment karta hu.
Customer: For a product aur mera product aata nahi hai aur seller mera call bhi nahi utha raha hai.
Customer: Ab uska kuch legally kuch ho sakta hai? Kyunki wo seller ka bhi mujhe IndiaMART se mila.
Executive: Aapki aawaz clear nahi aa rahi hai aapki.
Customer: Abhi ek seller ko.
Customer: Abhi clear hai?
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Main bol raha hu ki IndiaMART ka ek trusted seller, trusted seal wala seller hai. Usko agar main payment karta hu aur mera product nahi aata hai return aur wo mera phone bhi nahi utha raha hai.
Customer: To uska kya ho sakta hai?
Executive: Ek kaam karo, ek kaam karo aap ek mail likho, theek hai? Main aapke WhatsApp pe ek mail ID share karti hu, hamare customer care team ka. Jo bhi aapke sath hua hai uska screenshot ye sab kuch bhi matlab written proof hai. Pure mail mein wo attach kar dena, wo mail aap kar do, hamari team aapse connect kar legi.
Customer: Accha nahi, abhi tak aisa kuch hua nahi hai. Main sirf isliye puch raha hu kyunki ek seller hai uska price bahut accha hai.
Customer: Lekin ye bhi lag raha hai ki aur iska kahin aur existence nahi hai.
Customer: Isne jo address bataya wo matlab aas paas ke ek address ka mera ek matlab office ka ek friend udhar hi hai. Wo bol raha hai aisa koi address mein koi koi company hai nahi us naam ka.
Customer: To isliye hame thoda doubt hua lekin iska price jo hai bahut hi accha price de raha hai.
Customer: Isliye puch raha agar kya aisa koi option hai legally ya IndiaMART ke through jisse IndiaMART unko matlab pakad sake ya kuch ek action le sake.
Executive: Haan aapko wo hamare paas buyer supplier conflict team hoti hai ek. Wahan pe agar aisa koi dispute hota hai buyer supplier mein to wo team unko connect karti hai jo bhi aap bata rahe ho us situation mein wo team pura handle karti hai.
Customer: Accha aisa koi platform hota hai normally jaise Alibaba hai unka apna ek payment platform hai agar platform ke through payment hota hai seller ke paas to seller product dene ke liye matlab ekdam binding hota hai. Kyunki fir se matlab platform ke paas ek proof hota hai ki haan buyer ne seller ko payment kiya hua hai is product ke liye. Samajh rahe hain?
Customer: Aisa kuch IndiaMART mein bhi hai?
Executive: Nahi nahi hamare through kuch payment nahi hota hai wo aapko directly karna padega.
Customer: Oh accha. Theek hai koi baat nahi main fir sirf janne ke liye mujhe karna tha ki agar aisa kuch action.
Executive: Mere number pe call kar lete aap 96 pe kyun call kiya tha aapne?
Customer: IndiaMART mein just IndiaMART likha samne 96 wala aa gaya to usme call kar liya. Itna socha nahi tha maine.
Executive: Accha ye aap IndiaMART pe na hamara ticket khul jata hai isliye main bol rahi hu.
Customer: Accha accha. Main to aap ek kaam karo abhi to ye aapka koi concern to hai nahi ye ticket main close kar rahi hu aapke paas ek mail aayega. To wahan pe aap wo CLM years de dena bas, theek hai?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Feedback de dena.
Customer: Aapka number bata dijiye please.
Executive: Main aapko WhatsApp pe apne number se matlab text kar de rahi hu.
Customer: Ji ji kar dijiye. Thank you.
Executive: Theek hai? Okay sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Enquired about action against fraudulent sellers.

- Asked about payment platform for secure transactions.



Resolution:

- Informed about buyer-supplier conflict team.

- Clarified direct payment process, no platform involvement.

- Ticket closed, feedback requested via email.

- Executive shared contact number via WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- seller, payment, platform, conflict, resolution
